Text: if you really want to upload vinyl you need to invest in some real hifi 1st. not this lowfi you are using!
Agreed, we're offering what we can, hope you'll excuse the low-fidelity for now, we find it quite superior to cd quality regardless.  Thanks for the feedback, hope you enjoy it!

Note on quality: In our testing, devices without an HDAudio interface or the ability to properly down-sample 96kHz content *may* suffer from distortion on louder tracks. To correct this ailment, download the 48kHz version or perform a proper downsampling with Audacity (or similar).
